subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: After a season in which they won only 23 games for a .348 winning percentage, the Golden State Warriors are 10 games over .500 this season and have a talented young core of players.
snippet: After a season in which they won only 23 games for a .348 winning percentage, the Golden State Warriors are 10 games over .500 this season and have a talented young core of players.
